document_name: Revised version Project Document KHDR 2010 and 2011.pdf

outputs.output_descr: The concept of social exclusion is well-established in policymaking circles and is increasingly being used to analyze socio-economic problems faced in EU accession countries and other developing countries including countries in South Eastern Europe.
The overall development of a country is intrinsically related to a stable and progressing economy. A stable and growing economy is always associated with increasing number of jobs, i.e. employment.

project_descr: The primary objective of the Kosovo Humane Development Report Project on Social Inclusion is the provision of a high quality research which stimulates public discussion and improves policymaking.
